node.title: COVID updates: 84 million rapid antigen tests ordered for close contacts
node.alt: A woman scans a QR check-in code at a COVID testing site
node.description: Here's a quick wrap of what's happening in COVID news across Australia.
node.content:
["Here's a quick wrap of what's happening in COVID news across Australia.", "You can jump to the COVID-19 stories you want to read by clicking below.", "
84 million rapid antigen tests ordered, but they won't be free
", "The federal government has\u00a0agreed to fund half the cost\u00a0of 84 million\u00a0rapid tests which have been purchased by the states and will\u00a0be handed out free to people identified\u00a0as close contacts.", "On Wednesday, the national cabinet\u00a0will decide\u00a0whether to discount rapid tests for\u00a0concession card holders.\u00a0", "But Prime Minister Scott Morrison has\u00a0continued\u00a0to resist pressure to subsidise the costs of tests for everyone else, despite complaints of hours-long queues for PCR tests.\u00a0", "\"We've invested hundreds of billions of dollars getting Australia through this crisis,\" he said at a press conference today.", "The tests have been made free to the public in other countries, such as the United Kingdom, where people can order free kits to be delivered by mail.", "", "
Rapid antigen tests have been hard to come by as COVID case numbers have ballooned.(ABC News: Danielle Bonica)
", "
One in five PCR tests positive in Victoria
", "Victoria reported a record 8,577 new COVID-19 cases and three\u00a0deaths today\u00a0as hospitalisations rose to their highest level in nearly two months.", "Victoria's COVID-19 response commander Jeroen Weimar said the Omicron variant was moving rapidly across the community, with\u00a0one in five tests coming back positive,\u00a0a tenfold increase on pre-Omicron rates.", "People are being urged to only go to PCR testing centres if they have symptoms and\u00a0have returned a positive rapid test\u00a0and to only call for an ambulance if it is a medical emergency.", "Victoria's Health Minister Martin Foley said the government would scale up the state's vaccination capacity, ensuring up to 300,000 Victorians can get vaccinated weekly.\u00a0", "From tomorrow across the country, people who have had their second vaccine shot four months ago will be eligible for a booster shot.", "
94 people hospitalised in South Australia, none on ventilators\u00a0
", "South Australia has reported 2,552 new\u00a0cases of COVID-19 and the number of people in hospital has risen to 94.", "Premier Steven Marshall said nine people were in the ICU, but no-one was on a ventilator.", "He said the state would now subscribe to the national definition of a close contact announced by the Prime Minister last week.", "\"Households and intimate contacts are automatically designated as close contacts,\" Mr Marshall\u00a0said.", "", "
Premier Steven Marshall has clarified the definition of a \"close contact\".(ABC News)
", "However, he said\u00a0there were two exceptions \u2014\u00a0areas with vulnerable people like aged care homes and Aboriginal communities\u00a0and areas where there was a significant level of transmission.\u00a0", "
NSW records highest number of hospitalisations since September\u00a0
", "In the 24 hours to 8pm, hospital admissions in New South Wales\u00a0rose to\u00a01,204, up from 1,066 in the previous reporting period.", "There are now 95 patients in intensive care and 25 on ventilators.\u00a0", "It's the highest number of people being treated for COVID-19 in the state's hospitals since September 23.", "", "
Long lines for testing continue amid a major shortage of rapid antigen test kits.(ABC News: Gavin Coote)
", "The Health Services Union (HSU) has warned the hospital system will reach a critical phase within\u00a0two to three months, with staff to potentially resign\u00a0because of fatigue\u00a0if changes are not made by the state government.", "Meanwhile, the Australian Medical Association NSW council\u00a0said it was becoming difficult to staff critical care areas of hospitals.", "\"It just means pushing [staff] harder and harder [when]\u00a0one of the\u00a0things we were\u00a0trying to do across this Christmas\u00a0period\u00a0was to try\u00a0to give staff downtime, to try to\u00a0prepare them for, you know, what\u00a0comes next,\" said AMA\u00a0chair\u00a0Michael Bonning.\u00a0", "#wa\u00a0", "
West\u00a0Australians to continue wearing masks\u00a0
", "Western Australia will extend its mask mandate in all public indoor settings until\u00a0January 7, after two new local cases of COVID-19 were recorded overnight.", "The cases are a 20-year-old male backpacker and his 24-year-old female housemate.", "The man was not vaccinated, while the woman was.", "Both cases are believed to be linked to the current Delta outbreak\u00a0and were infectious in the community.", "Masks will remain mandatory in all public indoor settings until Friday, while other restrictions on hospitality venues will be lifted on Tuesday.", "
Queensland man in 30's a 'probable'\u00a0COVID death\u00a0
", "Queensland authorities are investigating the death of a local\u00a0man in his late 30s after he returned a positive rapid antigen test.\u00a0", "Chief Health Officer John Gerrard said the man \"died suddenly in his home on the Gold Coast last night\"\u00a0and testing\u00a0was\u00a0underway to\u00a0confirm whether his\u00a0death was COVID-related.", "He said the death has been referred to the state coroner for investigation.\u00a0", "Queensland recorded\u00a04,249 new infections in the latest reporting period.", "There are 10 people in ICU in hospital and one person is on a ventilator.", "Dr Gerrard said as of yesterday, there were \"about 90\" COVID cases linked to a\u00a0cluster in the Aboriginal community of Cherbourg, 250 kilometres north-west of Brisbane.", "", "
Chemists are struggling to keep up with demand\u00a0for rapid antigen tests.\u00a0(ABC News: Melinda Howells)
", "Premier Annastacia Palaszczuk warned older Queenslanders who were yet to receive a vaccine booster to limit their movements in the coming weeks.", "She said the state had secured a stockpile of 18 million rapid antigen tests.\u00a0", "\"We'll be releasing those supplies, but also been speaking with the pharmacies \u2026 they're going to be getting more stockpiles in over the coming weeks as well.\"", "Authorities also plan to increase PCR testing capacity in the Gold Coast.\u00a0", "
Tasmania to stop phoning positive cases
", "Tasmania has detected a record 466\u00a0new daily COVID infections, with two people\u00a0in hospital,\u00a0no-one\u00a0in intensive care, and 278 cases being managed under the COVID@home program.", "Premier Peter Gutwein said the two cases in hospital were not admitted due to COVID.", "Health authorities said significant transmission occurred at the Party in the Apocalypse festival\u00a0in northern Tasmania last week, with around 10,000 people in attendance.\u00a0", "Mr Gutwein\u00a0said there were 25 COVID cases among festivalgoers.\u00a0", "Public Health deputy director Scott McKeown announced a text message system would notify positive cases and\u00a0ask them to isolate\u00a0to ease the demand on the state's contact tracers.", "The state government has also abandoned listing\u00a0exposure sites\u00a0for new cases, with low-risk sites from before the new year removed from the list.", "Only sites older than December 28 that are classified as \"close contact\" under the previous definition are still listed.", "
More cases in Greater Darwin, Alice Springs, Katherine and Tennant Creek
", "The Northern Territory has recorded 58\u00a0new COVID cases overnight\u00a0in\u00a0Greater Darwin, Alice Springs, Katherine and Tennant Creek.", "The case numbers include a\u00a0Katherine Hospital worker who health authorities believe was infected by a patient at the facility.\u00a0", "Of the total cases, 20\u00a0are linked to overseas or international arrivals, 17 are close contacts of previous cases and there are two cases of community transmission.", "Investigation is still needed to identify the source of 19 additional cases.", "There are 21 people with COVID-19 in hospital in the NT, none of them in ICU.\u00a0"]
